column1:
How can the Form on my business be used? How can it be useful for my business?|

You can create a custom Form on your business and receive user responses for it. The form on your business is highly customizable
column2: and you can create any fields of your choice in it. You can also add your own title and description for the Form on your business. With this Form on your business
column3: you can also receive contact information from users like their name
column5: etc. This form can be used for various purposes. For example
column6: if you are a hotel owner
column8: then you could use this form to receive bookings from users. This form can also be used to receive user feedbacks
column11:
etc. Responses of visitors for the form will be emailed to all business Admins.

|Business Solutions|Form

column1:
How can I manage the Form on my business?|

You can manage the Form on your business from the “Apps” section of your business Dashboard
column2: by clicking on the “Manage Form” button. From there
column3: you can configure the questions and properties of your form. To add a new question to the Form
column4:
click on the “Add a Question” link in the bottom portion of the “Manage Form” business.

|Business Solutions|Form

column1:
Can I make certain form fields as required?|

Yes
column2: you can make certain fields in the Form on your business as required / not required by selecting appropriate option for the “Required” field while adding a new question to Form. At any time
column3:
you can also change the “Required” property for a field by editing that field.

|Business Solutions|Form

column1:
How will I receive the responses when the Form on my business is filled by visitors?|

You
column2:
and the other Admins of your business (if any) will receive responses for the form filled on your business via email.

|Business Solutions|Form

column1: I have a business on this site. However
column2:
the Form feature is not available for my business. What can be the reason?|

There could be multiple reasons for this:
1) You might have chosen a Package for your business for which the Form App is not available. In this case
column3: you can see if choosing a different Package with the Form App suits you. You can change the Package for your business from the “Packages” section of your business Dashboard. Availability of Packages for businesses
column4:
and their features are conditional depending on the settings chosen by our site administrator.
2) It is possible that you might not have configured the Form for your business. You can configure the Form for your business by clicking on the “Manage Form” button in the “Apps” section of your business Dashboard.
3) You might not have activated the Form for your business. From the “Manage Form” section mentioned in point 2 above
column5:
you can activate the Form for your business by using the “Activate Form” field.

|Business Solutions|Form
